content:
You're welcome! I'm glad I could help. Checking Shipt's website and app is a great way to stay up-to-date on their sales and promotions. You can also use the app to browse their inventory, add items to your cart, and schedule your delivery.

Remember to also check for any promo codes or discounts that might be available. Shipt often offers special deals for new customers or loyalty rewards for frequent shoppers.

If you have any more questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask. Otherwise, happy shopping on Shipt, and I hope you score some great deals on milk, eggs, and bread!
